pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Simpley**Simpley** is a Python package designed to make coding in Python just a little bit easier. Everything in **Simpley** is just a simple function, so you can easily code anything in Python.## InstallationTo install **Simpley**, use one of the following commands:``` shpython3 -m pip install simpleypy -m pip install simpleypip3 install simpleypip install simpley```## DocumentationView the **Simpley** documentation [here](https://github.com/dylanopen/simpley)
